column2: an A.M. Eatery////Trendy but unimpressive breakfast chain. Expect long waits for a table and a menu full of pancakes adorned with confectionary gimmicks.  I have eaten here twice and each time found 1+ hr weekday waits (even at the seat yourself counter)
column3: indifferent wait staff (unless you know someone
column6: underdone pancakes and overdone bacon.  I really didn't enjoy their food. But
column7: I like fully cooked pancakes with fresh fruit in the batter.  If you like $6 cupcakes with a 3" crown of icing & sprinkles
column8: and frequently employ the word "ahh-may-zing" this might be your place.
